Hindrances -- Male Human Seasoned Adventurer
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d4-1 Strength: d4 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Night Terrors+: -1 Spirit
Doomed+: -2 Vigor (soak)
Heavy Sleeper: -4 Vigor (stay awake)
Jumpy: Must attempt Fear check whenever startled
Screamer+: Screams in reponse to a failed Fear check
Screamer: Screams in reponse to a failed Fear check
Skills (14 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Focus: (spi) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Athletics: (agi) d4 Healing: (sma) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Boating: (agi) d6 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Performance: (spi) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Skill Notes:
Amorous: -2 on Tests by a foe w/the Attractive feature
Heavy Sleeper: -4 Notice (wake up)
Unnatural Appetite: -2 Persuasion when eating habits are known
Size: 0
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 6; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Alchemist); Dodge; Fast Healer; Final Girl/Guy Hindrances: Amorous; Bleeder+; Bullet Magnet; Bully+; Bully; Corruption+; Cursed+; Doomed+; Dread; Heavy Sleeper; Jumpy; Material Components+; Night Terrors+; Screamer+; Screamer; Superstitious; Unnatural Appetite; Victim+ Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Alchemist): Has Material Components+ feature (Alchemist's Bag)
Bully+: Frequently belittles others and may turn violent
Bully: Frequently belittles others
Dread: +2 rolls on Fear Effects
Night Terrors+: Disturbs the sleep of others nearby
Superstitious: -1 on all Trait rolls if focus object or routine is disturbed
Combat
Parry: 4 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Thick Coat Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d4+d4 R3"); Mini Crossbow (2d4 R6"); Switchblade (d4+d4); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Bleeder+: Taking a Wound inflicts a level of Fatigue each rd (Vigor neg 1 rd; Raise or Healing ends)
Bullet Magnet: Hit by accidental fire by single-shot weapons on a 1-2 and shotguns and full-auto weapons on a 1-3
Dodge: -2 foe ranged attacks
Fast Healer: +2 Vigor (natural healing) and may check every 3 dy
Final Girl/Guy: R6" May spend a Benny 1/encounter to grant 5 Trait or damage rerolls
Screamer+: Scream after failed Fear check inflicts Distracted on self an allies in a 3" radius; successful smarts ends
Victim+: Frequently chosen as random target
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 15
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Alchemist): 3 Powers/15 Power Points
Arcane Background (Alchemist)-1: Concoctions given to others have specific aspects, use self Alchemy to activate, and must be used w/in 48 hr
Corruption+: Critical failure on arcane skill inflicts additional or increased hindrance until next advance
Cursed+: Powers cast to aid self suffer -2 arcane skill; critical failure stuns caster
Material Components+: Suffers -4 arcane skill rolls when materials are unavailable; critical failure exhausts materials
